title: club not showing up on updated or legacy client
body: i am the owner. all the other members and friends can see it :|

replies.body:
Broporo oooon duty! {{summoner:31}} 

I pulled up your account to fix that club issue, aaaand you should be good now! Hit me up if you still can't see your club.
it's still not showing up on the legacy or updated client :'(
